runs.comm: back of a length, rising ball, hops to fend it away into the leg side
gone! That was short outside off, hurried Jamshed as he looked to fetch the pull from outside off, hit it high in the air and short midwicket ran quickly to his right and took a dolly
Length ball outside off, left alone
back of a length, leaves Shehzad outside off, and he leaves again, shaped to play and withdrew his bat from the line of the ball
a bit fuller and Shehzad poked at it with no footwork. Moved away and took his outside edge, ran down to third man

got him! That's brilliant from Taylor. Went wide of the crease, angled it in towards off stump, very full. Younis' front foot was stuck and he pushed at the ball and nicked it through to the keeper, walking into the shot
length ball outside off, left alone
fuller and wider, a bit of away swing on this, Shehzad leaves again
another wide-ish outswinger, another leave
back of a length now, closer to off stump, makes Shehzad play and beats him with some more away movement
fuller and wider again, Shehzad leaves again
again on that fifth - maybe even sixth - stump line, and Shehzad lets another one go
back of a length on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
bouncer now and Sohail ducks low under it
shortish outside off. Sohail lets it go
back of a length, angling in towards off stump, defended soundly off the back foot
shortish rising ball, angling into the body. He rides the bounce well and plays it down towards point

Taylor has three! Three ducks! It's short and angling into the body again, no room to cut, but he goes after it with an angled bat and scoops it straight to backward point, who takes it after a juggle
four down! It's full outside off, but not full enough to drive. Shehzad goes hard at it, on the up, and slices it into the hands of gully
full outswinger outside off, left alone
a little closer to off stump now, still wide enough to leave comfortably
full now, and he comes forward and drives it to mid-off
length ball angling in towards off stump, pushed into the covers and he takes off for a single. Misbah sends him back
length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
wide outswinger, left alone
full, angling in towards off stump. Misbah shuffles across to defend, gets an inside edge into his pads
back of a length on off stump, walks across and nurdles it towards deep backward square leg
accurate bouncer, rising over middle stump. Maqsood bends low under it
length ball outside off and he presses forward to poke that into the covers
another bouncer, gets well above head height and Maqsood's semi-crouch is only perfunctory
back of a length outside off, uses his wrists to get on top of the bounce and squirt it away to backward point
full outside off, curling away all the time, Misbah leaves it alone
again in that wide channel, and Misbah leaves once more. He's getting it to swing away consistently
straightens his line a touch too much, sprays it down the leg side
back of a length, this one comes in with the angle towards off stump, and he plays late towards backward point
wider outside off this time and Misbah allows it through to the keeper
short and wide, and it's cut away between backward point and cover point
beauty. That swung away considerably as Misbah shuffled across - his front foot wasn't coming out at all - and beat his outside edge, completely opening him up
back of a length outside off and he steers it away to third man with an open face
fullish on off stump. Misbah shuffles across and defends back to the bowler
shorter now, outside off, punched to point
again it's back of a length and he walks across to get closer to the line and dabs it to the left of backward point
a bit closer to off stump now and he scuttles across to block it back to the bowler
a bit wider now and he pushes it away towards point, playing late
full outside off, checked drive to mid-off
full on the pads, flicked away to long leg
on the pads again and it's Misbah's turn to clip it away to that fielder at long leg
once more it's a touch too straight and he's lucky Maqsood can't whip it past short midwicket
back to that line outside off and he draws a loose waft from Maqsood, who is beaten by outswing
back of a length wide of off stump, sliced uppishly towards third man
shortish, angling into the body and he swivels to pull, off the glove and it bounces past the diving Ramdin towards fine leg
back of a length outside off, gets behind the line to play a controlled punch in front of point
beauty. He pressed forward, playing for outswing, and it came in off the pitch and went through the gate, just missing off stump
shortish outside off, gets on top of the bounce and dabs it down to third man
back of a length outside off and it's just a push but it hurries away to the right of point, may have gone for four if he hadn't got a hand to it on the dive
ooh. Misbah's bat goes up in an elaborate arc as he shapes to leave this outswinger, and it ends up hitting the edge and dropping a few feet short of the keeper
angles this into off stump, gets it to straighten, and he's opened up as he pokes it back towards the bowler
goes for the big drive to this not-quite-pitched-up outswinger and doesn't make contact
shortish rising ball angling into the body, blocked into the covers
full and wide and he gets forward and across and waves his bat at the ball and sends it flying over cover point
fullish, just outside off, and that's a super shot, just punches it on the up and it screams away through the vacant extra cover region
shortish outside off, rides the bounce and knocks it down towards point
back of a length outside off and Misbah jumps across to defend
back of a length again, nips in off the pitch and cramps Misbah who once again gets off his feet to defend
taken! That was short and wide and Misbah flashed hard at it, thick edge flew to the left of first slip but Gayle moved quickly to take an excellent catch with both hands
lovely delivery, full, nipping back sharply and just missing off stump after Akmal shoulders arms
length ball outside off and he gets a good stride out to defend into the off side
banged in short outside off, Akmal ducks under it
outswinger on a superb length outside off, invites another play and miss from Maqsood
back of a length now, guided away towards third man
walked across a long way and had to play around his front pad to work this incoming ball. Hit him on the pad, only a polite appeal for lbw. I suppose he was struck outside the line
back of a length on off stump, blocked to short cover
walked across, outside off, even before Holder delivered, and then came forward to drive this to short extra cover

dropped. Difficult chance for Sammy at third slip as Maqsood flashed hard at a wide one, was travelling very quickly and high, and he had to leap up and stick his left hand out above him to catch it. Only got a finger to it
length ball on middle and off, defended towards mid-on
short ball, Akmal swings his body through a hook, top-edges it but manages to clear the long leg boundary, beating the leaping Benn, the tallest fielder in the West Indies team
length ball outside off and he gets a positive stride in to punch it firmly back. Russell does well to field it in his follow-through
back of a length, angling in towards off stump, knocked into the on side for a quick single
length ball outside off and Maqsood moves across to defend to mid-on
fullish on off stump, Akmal whips it with the angle through midwicket
full, wide, and that's a lovely crisp drive from Akmal past the cover fielder, diving in vain to his right. Took a massive stride to get his head over the ball
back of a length outside off, left alone
back of a length outside off, hops across to defend to point
lovely, away movement and extra bounce from just back of a length and Akmal, premeditating the forward press, is in no position to play it, pokes and misses
takes a big step out of his crease, Holder bowls it full outside off, and he defends to mid-off
low full toss angling down the leg side, Maqsood can't connect with the flick
back of a length outside off and that's a good-looking punch from Maqsood through the gap at cover point
back of a length, angling into the body, tucked away to deep backward square leg
shortish, rising ball over off stump. Akmal jumps across to work it towards deep square leg
bouncer, Maqsood ducks
shortish on the body, tucked off the hips to deep square leg
a touch too full outside off, driven firmly to the right of mid-off, just a lovely straight-bat punch
fullish outside off and he shuffles across to work it to short midwicket
boom. That's a brilliant shot, had to fetch that pull from way outside off but he made such sweet contact that it flew over the forward square leg boundary
ohoho, lovely. That's a length ball, angling in towards off, and he just leans into it and sends it scurrying away to the cover boundary
length ball outside off and he gets his head over the ball to guide it away to the right of third man
fullish outside off, lets it curl away and plays it late towards backward point
wide-ish outswinger, left alone
length ball outside off, comes forward to dab it towards point
length ball on off stump, shuffles across and works it to short midwicket
slower bouncer, Maqsood lets it pass over his bowed head
short outside off, carved away to third man
nicely done. Fullish ball, went across and worked it from outside off towards midwicket
back of a length now and he gets on his toes and knocks it into the on side
Chris Gayle has dropped the World Cup a catch. Short ball, pulled powerfully, straight in and straight out at chest height at short midwicket
and now he draws the edge with a wide-ish length ball, goes for a big drive and it flies away through the recently vacated slip cordon
full-toss outside off, swiped to short midwicket
back of a length on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
length ball angling in towards off stump and he comes forward and tucks it to the right of short midwicket
back of a length wide outside off, and he shuffles across a long way to poke that towards point
starts with a short, wide ball that Akmal can't quite cut past point. Carter, the substitute fielder, dives to his right and makes a nice stop
fuller now and he gets nicely forward to drive towards the cover boundary
length ball on off stump, punched to short extra cover
a bit fuller now and he drives to the right of sweeper cover
tossed up, angled in towards middle stump, punched back to the bowler
full, slightly round-arm, angled in towards off stump, firm push back to the bowler
length ball outside off, carved away wristily to third man
back of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to sweeper cover
length ball, angling in towards off and cramping Akmal, who dabs it with an open face to backward point
length ball on off stump, blocked to short cover
back of a length, angling down leg, and he skips across to work it off his hips to the right of short fine leg. Taylor is the fielder and he dives across and gets a hand to it to slow it down
back of a length outside off, dabbed away to backward point
length ball on off stump, knocks it softly into the off side and calls Maqsood through for the single
down the track now and he shortens his length a bit, forces him to defend into the off side
tossed up outside off and he opens his bat face to steer it towards deep point
length ball, quickish, dabbed towards point for another quick single
full on leg stump, tucked away to the left of short fine leg
a bit of air outside off and he comes forward to push it towards extra cover
back of a length outside off, guided down to third man with an open face
length ball on off stump, pushed firmly to cover
back of a length on middle stump, looks to work it away off the back foot but can't get it past short midwicket
lovely delivery, angling it in towards middle stump and straightening it away. Opens up Maqsood, who manages to squeeze it away to sweeper cover, off the outside half of the bat
length ball angling in towards off stump. Looks to pick up the pushed single to cover, hits it too close to the fielder
length ball on off stump, whipped to short midwicket
tossed up outside off and he gets forward to steer it to sweeper cover
short and wide, cut firmly but Carter is quick to move to his right from backward point and stop it
tossed up high outside off, driven back to the bowler
full and wide again and he doesn't get to the pitch to drive and it slices off his outside edge to backward point
quicker, angled into the stumps and he presses forward to defend
fired in quick outside off and he clears his front leg and goes for a slog over the leg side. Miscues it and it drops into the vacant area at deep midwicket
tossed up on off stump and he comes forward to push it gently into the off side
length ball on off stump, straightens a touch as he closes his bat face and pops off the leading edge towards third man
fullish outside off, driven to sweeper cover
back of a length outside off, defended solidly off the back foot. This one straightened as well
back of a length on off stump, uses his hands well to manoeuvre that to the left of short cover
fullish outside off, pushed to short cover off the front foot
a touch shorter now and he punches it to the busy fielder at short cover
back of a length on off stump. Makes room to cut but can't beat point
dangled up slow outside off, driven to long-off

beauty. Beats Maqsood in the air, slow, and it dropped shorter than the batsman expected. Went for an uncertain drive and the ball dipped and turned past his outside edge. Was moving forward as he played it and the keeper took the bails off and appealed. It's gone up to the third umpire, and while he did drag his back foot out of the crease, he had quickly popped it back in before Ramdin could remove the bails
shortish outside off and he rocks back and slaps it away to the left of the man at sweeper cover
full-toss on off stump, driven down to long-on
down the track now, Benn slants it into his feet and he gets his front foot out of the way and swings it cleanly over midwicket. That's his fifty as well. Well played.
length ball on off stump, dabbed away to the right of point
length ball on off stump, pushed towards mid-on but short midwicket moves quickly to intercept

Gone. It's a low full-toss on off stump and Maqsood looked to hit it down the ground, went up off the bottom of his bat and Benn did brilliantly to catch that, diving full-length to his left from mid-on
length ball outside off, leaves it alone
length ball angling in towards off stump. Gets back and across to defend
fullish outside off, defended into the covers
and what a delivery to start the new spell. Angled in from wide of the crease, beautiful length, draws Akmal forward to defend and shapes it away late to beat his edge
short outside off, not wide enough to cut, chops it down towards backward point
back of a length outside off, punched to the right of point. Yelled "one" as soon as he played the shot
on the pads, tucked away through midwicket to get off the mark
back of a length outside off and he shuffles across to play it down towards mid-on
on the pads and he clips it away a long way to the left of the man at deep square leg. Excellent placement to pick up three
full on middle stump, clipped to short midwicket
shortish outside off, and again he can't get his square cut past point
length ball on a fourth-stump line, punched back to the bowler
short and wide and this time he has enough room to carve it with abandon to the point boundary. Fifty up for Akmal.
fullish outside off and he gets on the front foot to play a controlled push past short cover
fullish, angling into the stumps, swats across the line and bounces down to deep square leg
shortish, down the leg side, pulled down to long leg
banged in short, Akmal ducks under it
short, not enough width to cut, chops it down towards backward point
another bouncer, Akmal ducks again
length ball on off stump, dabbed away towards Carter at point
fuller now, punched firmly to mid-off
back of a length outside off and he hops across to defend into the covers
full on the pads, whips it into the on side, not too far off the pitch, didn't time it at all
full, down the leg side, and Afridi says thank you and clips it away into the gap to the right of short fine leg
full on off stump, driven to short extra cover
length ball outside off and that's a super shot from Afridi, opens his bat face and steers it extremely fine, just wide of the keeper
down the leg side again and Afridi gets his front foot across and sweeps it in the air, very fine, one bounce and over the rope
fullish on off stump, blocked carefully back towards the bowler
back of a length, not enough width to cut, straight to point
tossed up, angling in towards middle stump, blocked back to the bowler
now he makes room and goes inside-out, takes it from a middle-stump line and drives through extra cover
angled in flat towards leg stump. Opens up and works it to midwicket
full on middle and leg, clipped down to long-on

full-toss outsie off, driven to extra cover and that would have been a run-out had the throw been accurate. Akmal wanted the single, Afridi didn't, and when he turned back he still had a long way to go to get back in his crease. Throw was too wide of the stumps at the keeper's end
fullish on off stump and he clears his front leg to slice it towards point
fullish on leg stump, tucked away to the right of short midwicket
length ball on the stumps and he clears his front leg and swings it away cleanly to the wide long-on boundary

they moved a fielder back onto the midwicket boundary after that previous shot, and Russell bowled a straighter line. Went for the same shot, hit it well but hit it much squarer than the previous one, and it went straight down the throat of the fielder
length ball outside off, dabbed away to backward point
full on off stump, jabbed away into the covers
length ball on off stump, pushed towards point and Afridi immediately calls for a single from the non-striker's end
looks to play the paddle sweep. Not full enough and too far outside off for it, and it goes with the angle and hits him on the thigh pad
makes room now, carves the length ball through cover point
exposes all his stumps and goes for the sweep, slides through between batsman and leg stump
full-toss on leg stump and he misses the sweep. Off his front pad towards cover
this time he connects with the sweep, out to deep square leg
banged in short, Wahab bends at the waist to avoid it
shortish ball on off stump and he jumps in the air to keep it down. Off the inside-edge, into the chest, and down into the pitch
length ball on off stump, looks to tuck it into the leg side for a single. Too close to the short midwicket fielder and Afridi sends him  back
short ball down the leg side and he looks to tuck it away fine. Off the thigh pad to the left of the keeper
shot! That was another bouncer and he made a bit of room and ramped it deftly over the keeper's head
short ball, pulled in the air, one bounce down to deep midwicket
back of a length on off stump, makes room to cut, can't beat backward point
full on off stump, makes room and drives inside-out to long-off
full on off and middle, blocked back to the bowler
length ball outside off and he presses forward to poke it into the covers
a bit more loop and he gets his head over the ball to defend into the off side
on the pads now, flicked away to the right of midwicket
length ball outside off, steered to cover point with an open bat face
dug in short, down the leg side
full outside off, blocked into the covers. Hares out of the crease as always, and Afridi sends him back, wisely

whataball! That cut back in sharply from outside off and took the inside edge of his defensively-thrust bat, onto thigh pad and it looped towards the keeper, who dived forward and claimed a low catch. They've gone up to the third umpire now. Yup, straight into the gloves. Well taken, that.
full on off, punched back to the bowler
bouncer outside off, and Sohail ducks, putting himself in more danger of getting hit than if he had just stood there
full and wide, smashed back hard at the bowler
tossed up wide outside off, swept away towards deep square leg
and he's gone. Full-toss, and he swipes it straight into the hands of short midwicket. Nice low catch from Holder
tossed up on off stump, and he leans forward to prod it back down the ground
now it's slower and dips on the batsman and turns past his hesitantly thrusting bat
flatter and he gets nicely forward to push into the covers
length ball outside off, steered away to the left of backward point
short ball outside off, Irfan stands there and lets it go
in the blockhole on off stump, jabbed back at the bowler
short ball outside off and Irfan sways gently away from the line

big appeal from the fielders behind the wicket but not from Russell. West Indies have reviewed. That seemed to swing away after beating the bat, strangely. Irfan played inside the line of that length ball with an angled bat. Absolutely nothing on snicko when the ball passes his bat. West Indies have wasted a review. Could this come back to haunt them?
full on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
full, just outside off. Irfan pokes at it and the ball beats his edge once again
back of a length on off stump, blocked into the covers
down the track comes Sohail, swats it away to long-off
tossed up outside off, swung away to deep midwicket, all along the ground
dangles this slower, wide outside off, and Sohail goes for a slog-sweep and misses
flatter and fuller now as Sohail makes room. Jabs at it but can't connect
now he connects with the slog sweep but only with the edge of his bat. Soars 20 storeys high and it's Ramdin who settles under it in the end
